data

Class GraphData

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.GraphData

  • public class GraphData
extends java.lang.Object
    Data of a graph

    • Field Summary

      char[][] graph 
      boolean[][] path
      path[i][j]=true if the node(i,j) probably belongs to the final path found by an algorithm

      • inArea

        public boolean inArea(int x,
                      int y)
        Determine if node(x,y) is inside the graph
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the node
        y - the y-coordinate of the node
        Returns:
        true if the node is inside the graph, otherwise false

      • getGraph

        public char getGraph(int i,
                     int j)
        get certain character of the graph
        Parameters:
        i - the x-coordinate of the character in the graph
        j - the y-coordinate of the character in the graph
        Returns:
        character whose x-coordinate is i and y-coordinate is j in the graph
